== Prerequisites == 
  # WSS 3.0 / MOSS 2007 Environment 
    OR 
  # !SharePoint Foundation 2010 / !SharePoint 2010 Environment 
== Step 1. WSP Installation ==
  # You can [URL install] all the webparts with our step by step installation guide.

== Step 2. Register your Twitter Application ==
  # You can [Url register] application on twitter with our step by step registration guide.

== Step 3. Configuration of the Show Tweet webpart ==

  # Now you need to add the web part on the page from Web Part gallery <br/> http://sharepoint-twitter.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/showtweet-webpart-pane.png 
  # Once added, Configure screen name , Consumer Key , Consumer Secret, Access Token, Access Token Secret from the saved information in step 2 and also configure the tweet count  and whether to show user image and description <br/> http://sharepoint-twitter.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/show-tweet-webpart-properties.png
  # Once configured you will be able to see the tweets of this user <br/> http://sharepoint-twitter.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/show-tweet-webpart-demo.png
